languages.text: {n}Один из вид-скринов когитатора окрашивается красным. При виде этого Паскаль поднимает руку, подавая сигнал остальным участникам процедуры, после чего вытягивает из рукава коннектор и подключает его к машине.{/n} "Слуги Омниссии, свершите подношение духу машины очищенных инфокрипт, дабы он мог наполнить их данными истинными и откалиброванными. Да смилостивится Омниссия над нашими душами..."

{n}One of the cogitator's vid-screens turns red. Pasqal sees this and raises his hand, signalling to the rest of the Tech-Priests, then withdraws a connector from his sleeve and connects it to the machine.{/n} "Servants of the Omnissiah, make now the offering of cleansed data-crypts to the machine spirit so that it may be filled with their true and calibrated data. May the Omnissiah have mercy on our souls..."
languages.original_text: {n}Один из вид-скринов когитатора окрашивается красным. При виде этого Паскаль поднимает руку, подавая сигнал остальным участникам процедуры, после чего вытягивает из рукава коннектор и подключает его к машине.{/n} "Слуги Омниссии, свершите подношение духу машины очищенных инфокрипт, дабы он мог наполнить их данными истинными и откалиброванными. Да смилостивится Омниссия над нашими душами..."

May the Omnissiah have mercy on our souls..."

languages.text: {n}沉思者其中一个视讯屏幕变成了红色。帕斯卡留意到了这点，他举起手，向其他技术神甫示意。之后，他从袖子中取出一个连接器，把它连接在了机器上。{/n}“欧姆尼塞亚的仆人们啊，向机魂献上经过净化的数据密存器吧，这样它才能被经过校准的真实数据所填满。愿欧姆尼塞亚怜悯我们的灵魂……”
languages.original_text: {n}One of the cogitator's vid-screens turns red. Pasqal sees this and raises his hand, signalling to the rest of the Tech-Priests, then withdraws a connector from his sleeve and connects it to the machine.{/n} "Servants of the Omnissiah, make now the offering of cleansed data-crypts to the machine spirit so that it may be filled with their true and calibrated data. May the Omnissiah have mercy on our souls..."

traits.locale_text: {n}思考器其中一个视讯屏幕变成了红色。帕斯卡留意到了这点，他举起手，向其他技术祭司示意。之后，他从袖子中取出一个连接器，把它连接在了机器上。{/n}“欧姆尼塞亚的仆人们啊，向机魂献上经过净化的数据加密装置吧，这样它才能被经过校准的真实数据所填满。愿欧姆尼塞亚怜悯我们的灵魂……”

languages.text: {n}考算機のスクリーンの1つが赤くなる。それを見たパスカルの手が上がり、他の技術司祭たちに合図を送ると、袖からコネクタを取り出して機械に接続する。{/n}「万機神のしもべたちよ、機械精霊に浄化されたデータ・クリプトを供え、真に、計算されたデータで満たさん。万機神が我らの魂に慈悲を与えんことを…」
languages.original_text: {n}One of the cogitator's vid-screens turns red. Pasqal sees this and raises his hand, signalling to the rest of the Tech-Priests, then withdraws a connector from his sleeve and connects it to the machine.{/n} "Servants of the Omnissiah, make now the offering of cleansed data-crypts to the machine spirit so that it may be filled with their true and calibrated data. May the Omnissiah have mercy on our souls..."

traits.locale_text: {n}考算機の画面の1つが赤くなる。それを見たパスカルの手が上がり、他の技術司祭たちに合図を送ると、袖からコネクタを取り出して機械に接続する。{/n}「万機神のしもべたちよ、機械精霊に浄化されたデータ・クリプトを浄化し、真に、計算されたデータで満たさん。万機神が我らの魂に慈悲を与えんことを…」
{n}考算機のスクリーンの1つが赤くなる。それを見たパスカルの手が上がり、他の技術司祭たちに合図を送ると、袖からコネクタを取り出して機械に接続する。{/n}「万機神のしもべたちよ、機械精霊に浄化されたデータ・クリプトを供え、真に、計算されたデータで満たさん。万機神が我らの魂に慈悲を与えんことを…」

languages.text: {n}Einer der Vid-Bildschirme des Cogitator wird rot. Pasqal bemerkt das, hebt die Hand und gibt dadurch den übrigen Techpriestern ein Signal. Dann zieht er einen Anschluss aus seinem Ärmel und verbindet ihn mit der Maschine.{/n} "Diener des Omnissiah, bringt nun dem Maschinengeist gereinigte Daten-Krypten als Opfer dar, auf dass er gefüllt werde mit ihren wahren und kalibrierten Daten. Der Omnissiah sei unseren Seelen gnädig ..."
languages.original_text: {n}One of the cogitator's vid-screens turns red. Pasqal sees this and raises his hand, signalling to the rest of the Tech-Priests, then withdraws a connector from his sleeve and connects it to the machine.{/n} "Servants of the Omnissiah, make now the offering of cleansed data-crypts to the machine spirit so that it may be filled with their true and calibrated data. May the Omnissiah have mercy on our souls..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Einer der Vid-Bildschirme des Cogitator wird rot. Pasqal bemerkt das, hebt die Hand und gibt dadurch den übrigen Techpriestern ein Signal. Dann zieht er einen Anschluss aus seinem Ärmel und verbindet ihn mit der Maschine.{/n} "Diener des Omnissiah, bringt nun dem Maschinengeist gereinigte Daten-Krypten als Opfer dar, auf dass er gefüllt werde mit ihren wahren und kalibrierten Daten. Der Omnissiah sei unseren Seelen gnädig ..."

languages.text: {n}Un des écrans vidéo du cogitateur vire au rouge. Pasqal fait alors un signe de la main en direction des autres technoprêtres, puis sort un connecteur de sa manche et le relie à la machine.{/n} « Serviteurs de l'Omnimessie, faites offrande des cryptes de données purifiées à l'esprit de la machine pour qu'il reçoive leur bénédiction réelle et calibrée. Puisse l'Omnimessie avoir pitié de nos âmes... »
languages.original_text: {n}One of the cogitator's vid-screens turns red. Pasqal sees this and raises his hand, signalling to the rest of the Tech-Priests, then withdraws a connector from his sleeve and connects it to the machine.{/n} "Servants of the Omnissiah, make now the offering of cleansed data-crypts to the machine spirit so that it may be filled with their true and calibrated data. May the Omnissiah have mercy on our souls..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Un des écrans vidéo du cogitateur vire au rouge. Pasqal fait alors un signe de la main en direction des autres technoprêtres, puis sort un connecteur de sa manche et le relie à la machine.{/n} « Serviteurs de l'Omnimessie, faites offrande des cryptes de données purifiées à l'esprit de la machine pour qu'il reçoive leur bénédiction réelle et calibrée. Puisse l'Omnimessie avoir pitié de nos âmes... »

languages.text: {n}Una de las videopantallas del cogitador se vuelve roja. Ante esto, Pasqal levanta una mano en señal a los demás tecnosacerdotes, extiende un conector de su manga y lo conecta a la máquina.{/n} «Sirvientes del Omnissiah, ofreced ahora las criptas de datos purificadas al espíritu máquina para que las llene con sus datos verdaderos y calibrados. Que el Omnissiah se apiade de nuestras almas...».
languages.original_text: {n}One of the cogitator's vid-screens turns red. Pasqal sees this and raises his hand, signalling to the rest of the Tech-Priests, then withdraws a connector from his sleeve and connects it to the machine.{/n} "Servants of the Omnissiah, make now the offering of cleansed data-crypts to the machine spirit so that it may be filled with their true and calibrated data. May the Omnissiah have mercy on our souls..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Una de las videopantallas del cogitador se vuelve roja. Ante esto, Pasqal levanta una mano en señal a los demás tecnosacerdotes, extiende un conector de su manga y lo conecta a la máquina.{/n} «Sirvientes del Omnissiah, ofreced ahora las criptas de datos purificadas al espíritu máquina para que las llene con sus datos verdaderos y calibrados. Que el Omnissiah se apiade de nuestras almas...».

languages.text: {n}Kavramsayarın video ekranlarından birisi kırmızıya dönüyor. Pasqal bunu görüyor ve elini kaldırıyor; diğer Tekno Rahiplere işaret veriyor; ardından cübbesinin kolundan bir bağlantı parçası çıkararak makineye bağlıyor.{/n} "Hermesih'in hizmetkârları, temizlenmiş veri mahzenlerini makine ruhuna adak olarak sunun şimdi ki ruh, onların hakiki ve ayarlı verileriyle dolabilsin. Hermesih ruhlarımıza merhamet etsin."
languages.original_text: {n}One of the cogitator's vid-screens turns red. Pasqal sees this and raises his hand, signalling to the rest of the Tech-Priests, then withdraws a connector from his sleeve and connects it to the machine.{/n} "Servants of the Omnissiah, make now the offering of cleansed data-crypts to the machine spirit so that it may be filled with their true and calibrated data. May the Omnissiah have mercy on our souls..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kavramsayarın video ekranlarından birisi kırmızıya dönüyor. Pasqal bunu görüyor ve elini kaldırıyor, diğer Tekno Rahiplere işaret veriyor, ardından giysisinden bir bağlantı parçası çıkararak makineye bağlıyor.{/n} "Hermesih'in hizmetkârları, temizlenmiş veri mahzenlerini makine ruhuna adak olarak sunun şimdi ki onların gerçek ve ayarlı verileriyle dolabilsin. Hermesih ruhlarımıza merhamet etsin."
